messages.content:
Please transfer account # 306035940000 American Properties from store #9456 Royal Oak and make our store #9462 Waterford their new home store as we do 90% of their business
Please and Thank you !!

The requestor must provide:                              1- 12 digits quote number                                  2-  New Home store 4 digits / old home address and new home address                        3- Send an email to AF Stores Pricing AFStoresPricing@ppg.com

Can you please have the following accounts home store be changed from 9458 Southfield to 9456 Royal Oak?
318660600000 – ROCK N ROLL PAINTING
Thank you,

The requestor must provide:                          1- 12 digits quote number                          2-  New Home store 4 digits / old home address and new home address                        3- Send an email to AF Stores Pricing AFStoresPricing@ppg.com

Credit Team will be able to assist you with your request. Email AF Credit afcredit@ppg.com

If you have not done so already please open the Job Account for each painter that is working for Landmark using this Format  - Landmark / Painter Name. When setting up the job account, please make sure that the billing address is the same as the painters. We do not want the builder being billed for the painters purchases.
Credit Team will be able to assist you with your request. Email AF Credit afcredit@ppg.com
How do I change customer name in customer master?
Credit Team will be able to assist you with your request. Email AF Credit afcredit@ppg.com
Please inactivate, remove credit, and pricing for these duplicate accounts
Credit Team will be able to assist you with your request. Email AF Credit afcredit@ppg.com
How do I go about making old duplicate accounts cash accounts with no purchase history over multiple years inactive
Credit Team will be able to assist you with your request. Email AF Credit afcredit@ppg.com
Were you able to set up a cash job account with 12 digits for this organization's name?
Credit Team will be able to assist you with your request. Email AF Credit afcredit@ppg.com
Please create a cash only job account
Credit Team will be able to assist you with your request. Email AF Credit afcredit@ppg.com
please note that this customer’s account was changed to cash only as they were in late-stage collections.
The below pricing has been approved since last week but still isn’t showing in the Elevate to bill out because Gus put the being date as tomorrow

The requestor must send the following information to AF Stores Pricing AFStoresPricing@ppg.com                        POS Screenshot showing                           1-  Customer quote number                          2-  Prod Code & Size and/or Item Code, Family QuoteCode/Cat Code                         3- Pricing showing @ POS

Where can I find the latest MGPL lists?

MGPL Price List Step by Step   1-https://ppgindustriesinc.sharepoint.com/sites/StoreConnect/SitePages/United-States.aspx                                                                2- Click Pricing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3- Select MGPL Folder                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             4- Select MGPL Price list (for Example 2022 May 16 NEW MGPLs) for all markets except South Texas and Carolinas and for Carolinas and South Texas MGPL Price list (for example 2023 May 15- MVP MGPLs)
Can you please provide a link, or actual document, to the updated Excel Workbook for MGPL?

MGPL Price List Step by Step   1-https://ppgindustriesinc.sharepoint.com/sites/StoreConnect/SitePages/United-States.aspx                                                                2- Click Pricing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3- Select MGPL Folder                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             4- Select MGPL Price list (for Example 2022 May 16 NEW MGPLs) for all markets except South Texas and Carolinas and for Carolinas and South Texas MGPL Price list (for example 2023 May 15- MVP MGPLs)
one of my stores has a print of all the products with each MGPL price, but it is from 2021 so I wanted to reach to see if there was any way of getting an updated version to keep handy

MGPL Price List Step by Step   1-https://ppgindustriesinc.sharepoint.com/sites/StoreConnect/SitePages/United-States.aspx                                                                2- Click Pricing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3- Select MGPL Folder                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             4- Select MGPL Price list (for Example 2022 May 16 NEW MGPLs) for all markets except South Texas and Carolinas and for Carolinas and South Texas MGPL Price list (for example 2023 May 15- MVP MGPLs)
We are in need of Whole list and Market MG8 Level 8 for all sku please.

MGPL Price List Step by Step   1-https://ppgindustriesinc.sharepoint.com/sites/StoreConnect/SitePages/United-States.aspx                                                                2- Click Pricing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3- Select MGPL Folder                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             4- Select MGPL Price list (for Example 2022 May 16 NEW MGPLs) for all markets except South Texas and Carolinas and for Carolinas and South Texas MGPL Price list (for example 2023 May 15- MVP MGPLs)
How do I get a copy of my customer MGPL?

MGPL Price List Step by Step   1-https://ppgindustriesinc.sharepoint.com/sites/StoreConnect/SitePages/United-States.aspx                                                                2- Click Pricing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3- Select MGPL Folder                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             4- Select MGPL Price list (for Example 2022 May 16 NEW MGPLs) for all markets except South Texas and Carolinas and for Carolinas and South Texas MGPL Price list (for example 2023 May 15- MVP MGPLs)
Where can I find a category code/Cat Code/ Family quote code list?

Product Code (SKU) and Cat Code/Family Code List Step by Step       1-https://ppgindustriesinc.sharepoint.com/sites/StoreConnect/SitePages/United-States.aspx                                                                2- Click Pricing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3- Find File " CAT CODE BY SKU"

Product Code (SKU) and Cat Code/Family Code List Step by Step       1-https://ppgindustriesinc.sharepoint.com/sites/StoreConnect/SitePages/United-States.aspx                                                                2- Click Pricing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3- Find File " CAT CODE BY SKU"

How do I change SMAN/ADM/SalerRepTerritory for a customer?
ADM or SMAN should reach out to your Regional Manager and get him/her submit this request to ACUSCACustomerTransfers <ACUSCACustomerTransfers@ppg.com>
Need to enter pricing, no home store listed or rep.
ADM or SMAN should reach out to your Regional Manager and get him/her submit this request to ACUSCACustomerTransfers <ACUSCACustomerTransfers@ppg.com>
Quote stuck. Send SMAN transfer – tell them you need completed as soon as possible. Must use 2024 valid SMAN.
ADM or SMAN should reach out to your Regional Manager and get him/her submit this request to ACUSCACustomerTransfers <ACUSCACustomerTransfers@ppg.com>
Can you please do an immediate transfer for the account below
ADM or SMAN should reach out to your Regional Manager and get him/her submit this request to ACUSCACustomerTransfers <ACUSCACustomerTransfers@ppg.com>

I inherited the Chattanooga market in January so I learning the customers. I just met with Southeast Painters to discuss upcoming jobs. Apparently, the account has been transferred multiple times in the last year to different ADM’s and the most recent ADM is not even in the market. This an extremely large account and there was no pricing attached in APEX when I initially looked.
ADM or SMAN should reach out to your Regional Manager and get him/her submit this request to ACUSCACustomerTransfers <ACUSCACustomerTransfers@ppg.com>
JX5 is not a valid 2024 SMAN. As such, RM/OP MGR must transfer account to valid 2024 SMAN.  Quote will remain in limbo until transferred.
ADM or SMAN should reach out to your Regional Manager and get him/her submit this request to ACUSCACustomerTransfers <ACUSCACustomerTransfers@ppg.com>

PPG Credit just re-activated a charge account for Industrial Commercial that has Zero sales history on it. I need it transferred to SMAN 77G and the home store needs to be moved to #9456 Royal Oak per customers request, Christine Zezza just informed me that everything on her end is completed, and the customer can move forward using the account today.
ADM or SMAN should reach out to your Regional Manager and get him/her submit this request to ACUSCACustomerTransfers <ACUSCACustomerTransfers@ppg.com>
